channel.title: Chrome App on Ruddra

https://ruddra.com/tags/chrome-app/Recent content in Chrome App on RuddraHugo -- gohugo.ioWed, 19 Jul 2017 16:12:47 +0000
Ubuntu Hacks: Launching Chrome Apps at Startuphttps://ruddra.com/posts/ubuntu-protip-launching-chrome-apps-at-startup/Wed, 19 Jul 2017 16:12:47 +0000https://ruddra.com/posts/ubuntu-protip-launching-chrome-apps-at-startup/Chrome apps are really handy when you don’t want to overhaul your system with apps for every little purpose. Starting those apps at startup can be used instead of manually starting them every time you want to use them. Like starting the messenger at startup of the system. To do that.
